thread.title: Fitbit slumps almost 6%, poised to snap four-session winning streak
thread.title_full: Fitbit slumps almost 6%, poised to snap four-session winning streak - MarketWatch

author: Sue Chang
title: Fitbit slumps almost 6%, poised to snap four-session winning streak
text: Shares of Fitbit were down sharply on Monday, on track to snap a four-session winning streak. Fitbit FIT, -5.94% soared nearly 26% last week, bolstered by news that Target Corp. TGT, +2.11% will supply its U.S. employees, numbering some 326,000, with the fitness trackers as part of its corporate wellness push. Fitbit shares fell 5.7% to $38.33.
